header: Where would you like us to pay your State Pension?
p: We can only pay your State Pension into your personal or joint bank or building society account.
previousHeader: How would you like to be paid?
hintText: If the account is not in your name, we will need to make further checks.

errors.required: Enter the name on the account
errors.format: Name on the account must start with a letter and only include letters, hyphens, apostrophes, full stops, spaces and ampersands
errors.length: Name on the account must be 70 characters or less

errors.format: Account number must contain numbers only
errors.transunionInvalid: The account number does not exist - check it and try again

errors.format: Enter a sort code in the correct format, like 11 22 33
errors.length: Enter a sort code in the correct format, like 11 22 33
errors.transunionInvalid: The sort code does not exist - check it and try again

buildingRoll.label: Building society roll number (if you have one)
buildingRoll.previousLabel: Building society roll or reference number
buildingRoll.label-display: Building society roll number (if you have one)
buildingRoll.hint: You can find it on your card, statement or passbook

errors.format: Roll or reference number must only include numbers 0 to 9, letters a to z, hyphens, full stops, spaces, commas, slashes, apostrophes, asterisks, ampersands and brackets
errors.length: Roll or reference number must be 18 characters or less
